name: In The Walls
description:
Controls:

  • All controls can be rebound in the settings menu
  • A and D to move left and right
  • W to jump
  • Click and hold to aim dice
  • E to cancel a throw
  • "F" to interact

Tips:

  • If you get stuck, you can load the last checkpoint from the menu.
  • In the settings there is an option for showing what dice power is currently in effect.
  • Explore upwards to find the next zone.

Story:

  • This game is cannon to project 2021.
  • In 2021 I gave myself a challenge to make 12 games in 12 months with one story.
  • You can play the other cannon games here: https://itch.io/c/2063306/12-games-12-months-1-story

Theme:

  • The theme of this jam was 'Roll of the Dice'. In this game, you use your dice for combat, timing the attacks carefully to maximize damage. Beware the cat who wields a 20 sides dice of his own.

Credits:

  • Art Master: ThatGirlPreston (Instagram: @ThatGirlPreston)
  • Level Design: JaredMV (https://jaredmv.itch.io/)
  • Programming: IanGoGo (https://iangogo.itch.io/)
  • Music: BrennaNicole (https://www.youtube.com/user/Music13Guitar)

*Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Jam 2022.*
